body.p:
Pendleton co Ky April the 14th 1862
Sir

i am in a great deal of trouble that my son is in the penitentiary it has caused me a great deal of sorrow and i have no body to work for me now my son that is at home was chopping a few days ago the ^axe^ glanced struck his leg leaving a despperate gash i am fraid he wont be able to work for some months i ask you for my so family's to releasse my son i dont no what i am to do without you can send him home in time to put in a crop i ask you in the name of god to not to forget a poor wonan woman in in time of trouble god will bless you for the kindness if you will only do so
i will try and rest in hopes that you will release my boy
to mr Beriah Magoffin= for the release of Joseph Hendricks
